Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! I have been playing KSP for awhile and had an awesome Idea for a cinematic. So, I put in the time and effort and got it together. Its called "Per Aspera Ad Astra" or when translated "Through Hardship to the Stars" which I feel is so much like the feeling I get when I play KSP. The audio is from the Sagan Series on youtube. I hope you guys enjoy this! Subscribe for more coming soon! Let me know what you guys think!

http://youtu.be/XrizCWyz4Ls

Edited February 12, 2014 by Twitchmafia
There is a sub-forum for player-made videos. I will move this there for you, Twitchmafia.

I really liked the video, especially how the clips you chose matched the audio so well. It looked very nice, and you've got some pretty cool ship designs there. The only thing that bugged me was the transitions, there was so many and they were all the same. It felt like they interrupted the flow of the video, but definitely, very nice video, I can't wait to see what new ones you make.

I really liked the video, especially how the clips you chose matched the audio so well. It looked very nice, and you've got some pretty cool ship designs there. The only thing that bugged me was the transitions, there was so many and they were all the same. It felt like they interrupted the flow of the video, but definitely, very nice video, I can't wait to see what new ones you make.

Yea, I tried to make it somewhat like the original video it was Inspired by. Thank your for the criticism though! Ill Keep it in mind the next time Im making a video!
Just for anyone curious... I am going to be starting a Series for KSP soon. So subscribe the first video is set for saturday.
